header.title: Observer Release Notes History

item.p: Bugfix: ttb:p/2 can now take the flag clear.
Bugfix: ttb:format/1,2 can now handle trace of messages sent to a process addressed with {ProcName,Node}.
crashdump_viewer: Atoms are shown 100 at the time to avoid the browser hanging/timing out.

list.item: The 'Name' and 'Spawned as' columns are merged into one column showing name if it exists, else initial function.
Added more warnings if the dump is truncated.
To avoid that the browser times out during reading/translating when the dump is really big, a temporary page is shown which redirects to the start page when ready.

item.p: etop now also works on nonode@nohost using etop:start().
Process info is added to the "to-process" in send trace messages
crashdump_viewer can now handle dumps created on Windows.

section.title: Observer 0.9.2 (OTP R8B)
section.p: This was Observer with the crashdump_viewer added for OTP R8B.

section.title: Observer 0.9.1 (OTP R7B01/R8B)
section.p: This was the first version of Observer for OTP R7B01 and R8B.

section.title: Observer 0.9 (OTP-R9B)
section.p: The Observer application is a collection of tools for tracing and investigation of distributed systems.

list.item: Observer is still in beta stadium.
